title: Could not connnect to the http server. Please check that your internet connection is enabled.
body: Does anyone know how to deal with it? I can log on with my roommate's laptop so that is not a problem of net. I also copy the game from my friend but it does not work.

replies.body: Sounds like you have a firewall issue. Please disable any firewalls you have, test the connection and then re-enable it and let us know how it works out.
At what point is this error coming up for you? Are you unable to patch, unable to login, or unable to join an active game?
